title: Lula O. Lubchenco, MD Endowed Chair in Neonatology
description: To provide support for a faculty chair in the Department of Pediatrics.  The Chair holder's work will be on all aspects of neonatology inclusive of teaching, training, research, clinical care and other activities deemed appropriate by the chair.
marketingContent: To provide support for a faculty chair in the Department of Pediatrics. The Chair holder's work will be on all aspects of neonatology inclusive of teaching, training, research, clinical care and other activities deemed appropriate by the chair.
